summary: This bill, the "EO 14285 Act of 2025," introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14285. This Executive Order concerns the development of seabed mineral resources, suggesting a focus on national resource management. The bill has been referred to several committees, including Natural Resources, Armed Services, Foreign Affairs, and Financial Services, indicating a broad scope. The core purpose is to give the executive order the force of law.
